privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introduction: This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and disclose your personal information.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.description: We collect personal information you provide directly to us.

use.title: How We Use Your Information
use.description: We use the information we collect to provide and improve our services.

disclosure.title: Information Sharing
disclosure.description: We may share your information with third-party service providers.

security.title: Security
security.description: We implement security measures to protect your information.

childrenPolicy.title: Children's Privacy
childrenPolicy.description: Our services are not directed to children under 13.

options.title: Your Choices
options.description: You may update or correct your information at any time.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have questions about this policy, please contact us.

settings.description: Manage your account, clinic, and application preferences

appointments.title: Appointments
appointments.searchPlaceholder: Search by patient, dentist, or service
appointments.noPatientRecord: No patient record found for your account

hero.title: About Our Clinic
hero.description: Dedicated to providing exceptional dental care with a compassionate touch.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Founded in 2005, our clinic started with a simple vision: to create a dental practice where patients feel comfortable, valued, and receive the highest quality of care. Over the years, we've grown, but our core values remain the same.
story.paragraph2: We believe in building lasting relationships with our patients, understanding their unique needs, and empowering them with knowledge about their oral health. Our team is passionate about dentistry and committed to continuous learning to bring you the latest advancements in dental science.
story.paragraph3: From a small practice to a leading dental care provider in the community, we are proud of the journey we've taken and grateful for the trust our patients place in us. We look forward to many more years of serving you and your family.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To simplify dental care, empower patients, and enhance smiles through innovation and compassionate service.

simplify.title: Simplify Dental Care
simplify.description: Making dental visits easy and stress-free with streamlined processes and clear communication.

empower.title: Empower Patients
empower.description: Educating and involving patients in their treatment decisions for better oral health outcomes.

enhance.title: Enhance Smiles
enhance.description: Utilizing advanced techniques and personalized care to achieve beautiful, healthy smiles.

member1.name: Dr. Ahmed Hassan
member1.bio: Dr. Hassan established the clinic with a vision for patient-centered care. With over 20 years of experience, he is dedicated to advanced dental techniques.

member2.name: Dr. Sara Khan
member2.bio: Dr. Khan specializes in orthodontics, creating perfect smiles for patients of all ages. Her gentle approach makes every visit comfortable.

member3.name: Dr. Omar Sharif
member3.bio: Dr. Sharif is our expert in oral surgery, providing safe and effective procedures with utmost precision and care.

cta.title: Ready to Experience Exceptional Dental Care?
cta.description: Contact us today to schedule your appointment and join our family of happy, healthy smiles.

hero.title: Your Brightest Smile Starts Here
hero.subtitle: Exceptional Dental Care for the Whole Family
hero.description: Experience compassionate, state-of-the-art dentistry designed to make you smile. From routine check-ups to advanced cosmetic procedures, we're dedicated to your oral health and comfort.

contactForm.title: Send us a Message
contactForm.description: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contactForm.error: Failed to send message. Please try again later.
contactForm.successMessage: Thank you for your message. We'll get back to you soon!

form.successMessage: Thank you for your message. We'll get back to you soon!

clinicLocations.title: Our Clinic Locations
clinicLocations.description: Find a convenient location near you.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: Comprehensive dental care tailored to your needs.

preventiveCare.title: Preventive Care
preventiveCare.description: Regular check-ups, cleanings, and fluoride treatments to maintain optimal oral health.

cosmeticDentistry.title: Cosmetic Dentistry
cosmeticDentistry.description: Teeth whitening, veneers, and bonding to enhance your smile's appearance.

restorativeDentistry.title: Restorative Dentistry
restorativeDentistry.description: Fillings, crowns, bridges, and implants to restore function and aesthetics.

orthodontics.title: Orthodontics
orthodontics.description: Braces and clear aligners for a perfectly aligned smile.

oralSurgery.title: Oral Surgery
oralSurgery.description: Extractions, wisdom teeth removal, and other surgical procedures.

emergencyCare.title: Emergency Care
emergencyCare.description: Prompt treatment for dental emergencies like severe pain or injury.

pricing.title: Choose Your Plan
pricing.description: Select the perfect plan for your practice needs

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Practice?
cta.description: Join thousands of healthcare providers who are streamlining their operations with our platform.

testimonials.title: What Our Patients Say
testimonials.description: Hear from those who trust us with their smiles.

testimonial1.name: Sarah M.
testimonial1.text: The best dental experience I've ever had! The staff is incredibly friendly and professional.

testimonial2.name: John D.
testimonial2.text: I used to dread dental visits, but this clinic changed my mind. Highly recommend!

testimonial3.name: Emily R.
testimonial3.text: My kids love coming here! They make dental care fun and easy.

introduction.p1: Welcome to our healthcare management platform. These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of our services.

accounts.title: User Accounts
accounts.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password and for restricting access to your computer.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property Rights
intellectualProperty.content: The service and its original content, features and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of our company.

links.title: Links to Other Websites
links.content: Our service may contain links to third-party web sites or services that are not owned or controlled by us.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account and bar access to the service immediately, without prior notice or liability.

indemnification.title: Indemnification
indemnification.content: You agree to defend, indemnify and hold harmless the company from and against any and all claims, damages, obligations, losses, liabilities, costs or debt, and expenses.

limitationOfLiability.title: Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.content: In no event shall the company, nor its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: The information on this website is provided on an 'as is' basis. To the fullest extent permitted by law, this company excludes all representations, warranties, conditions and terms.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These terms shall be interpreted and governed by the laws of the jurisdiction in which our company is based.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: Sorry, the page you are looking for doesn't exist. It might have been moved, deleted, or you entered the wrong URL.

hero.title: Get in Touch
hero.description: We're here to help you transform your healthcare practice. Reach out to us for any questions, support, or to schedule a demo.

gettingStarted.question: How quickly can I get started with the platform?
gettingStarted.answer: You can sign up and start using basic features immediately. For a full implementation with data migration, our team typically completes the process within 1-2 weeks.

training.question: Do you offer training for new users?
training.answer: Yes, we provide comprehensive training for all new clients. This includes live sessions, video tutorials, and detailed documentation to help your team get up to speed quickly.

security.question: Is my data secure on your platform?
security.answer: Absolutely. We implement industry-leading security measures including end-to-end encryption, regular security audits, and HIPAA compliance to ensure your data is always protected.

integration.question: Can I integrate with my existing systems?
integration.answer: Yes, our platform offers robust API capabilities and pre-built integrations with popular EHR systems, accounting software, and other healthcare tools. Our team can help with custom integrations as needed.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Transform your healthcare practice with our comprehensive management platform.

story.title: [EN] قصتنا
story.paragraph1: [EN] تأسست عيادتنا في عام 2005 برؤية بسيطة: إنشاء عيادة أسنان يشعر فيها المرضى بالراحة والتقدير ويتلقون أعلى مستويات الجودة في الرعاية. على مر السنين، نمت عيادتنا، لكن قيمنا الأساسية بقيت كما هي.
story.paragraph2: [EN] نحن نؤمن ببناء علاقات دائمة مع مرضانا، وفهم احتياجاتهم الفريدة، وتمكينهم بالمعرفة حول صحة فمهم. فريقنا متحمس لطب الأسنان وملتزم بالتعلم المستمر لتقديم أحدث التطورات في علوم طب الأسنان.
story.paragraph3: [EN] من عيادة صغيرة إلى مزود رعاية أسنان رائد في المجتمع، نحن فخورون بالرحلة التي قطعناها وممتنون للثقة التي يضعها مرضانا فينا. نتطلع إلى سنوات عديدة أخرى من خدمتكم وعائلاتكم.

mission.title: [EN] مهمتنا
mission.description: [EN] تبسيط رعاية الأسنان، تمكين المرضى، وتحسين الابتسامات من خلال الابتكار والخدمة الرحيمة.

simplify.title: [EN] تبسيط رعاية الأسنان
simplify.description: [EN] جعل زيارات الأسنان سهلة وخالية من التوتر من خلال عمليات مبسطة وتواصل واضح.

empower.title: [EN] تمكين المرضى
empower.description: [EN] تثقيف المرضى وإشراكهم في قرارات علاجهم لتحقيق نتائج أفضل لصحة الفم.

enhance.title: [EN] تحسين الابتسامات
enhance.description: [EN] استخدام التقنيات المتقدمة والرعاية الشخصية لتحقيق ابتسامات جميلة وصحية.

member1.name: [EN] د. أحمد حسن
member1.bio: [EN] أسس الدكتور حسن العيادة برؤية للرعاية المتمحورة حول المريض. مع أكثر من 20 عامًا من الخبرة، وهو مكرس لتقنيات طب الأسنان المتقدمة.

member2.name: [EN] د. سارة خان
member2.bio: [EN] تتخصص الدكتورة خان في تقويم الأسنان، وتخلق ابتسامات مثالية للمرضى من جميع الأعمار. نهجها اللطيف يجعل كل زيارة مريحة.

member3.name: [EN] د. عمر شريف
member3.bio: [EN] الدكتور شريف هو خبيرنا في جراحة الفم، ويقدم إجراءات آمنة وفعالة بأقصى درجات الدقة والعناية.

cta.title: [EN] هل أنت مستعد لتجربة رعاية أسنان استثنائية؟
cta.description: [EN] اتصل بنا اليوم لتحديد موعدك والانضمام إلى عائلتنا من الابتسامات السعيدة والصحية.
